name: CPSessionConfiguration
desc: An object that provides vehicle properties and configuration for the CarPlay environment.

items.name: init(delegate: CPSessionConfigurationDelegate)
items.desc: Creates a session configuration with a delegate.

items.name: protocol CPSessionConfigurationDelegate
items.desc: A protocol for receiving notifications about changes to vehicle properties and configuration.

items.name: var delegate: CPSessionConfigurationDelegate?
items.desc: An object that serves as the delegate to the session configuration.

items.name: var contentStyle: CPContentStyle
items.desc: The content style that the vehicle selects.

items.name: struct CPContentStyle
items.desc: The types of content style that the vehicle allows.

items.name: var limitedUserInterfaces: CPLimitableUserInterface
items.desc: A bit mask value that indicates the user interface limits.

items.name: struct CPLimitableUserInterface
items.desc: The types of limitable user interface elements.
